item.title: Modernizing Mainframe Applications with Azure- A Comprehensive Guide
item.description: As organizations strive to stay competitive in today’s fast-paced digital landscape, many are considering migrating their traditional mainframe applications to the cloud. Azure, Microsoft’s powerful cloud platform, offers a compelling alternative to the mainframe, providing hyperscale compute and storage in a highly available environment. In this comprehensive guide, we’ll explore the key strategies and considerations for making the switch from a mainframe platform to Azure. MIPS vs. vCPUs: Mapping Mainframe Workloads to the Cloud One of the first challenges in a mainframe migration is determining the appropriate level of compute resources needed to run your workloads on Azure.
